newsitem.title: CANADA: Penn West closes C$47 mln equity issue.
newsitem.headline: Penn West closes C$47 mln equity issue.

text.p: Penn West Petroleum Ltd said on Tuesday it closed its issue of four million common shares at C$11.75 each for gross proceeds of C$47 million.
The bought deal was placed with a group of underwriters led by FirstEnergy Capital Corp and Griffiths McBurney & Partners.
Penn West said net proceeds would be used to fund a C$25 million increase in the company's 1996 capital budget, increasing it to about C$95 million.
The remainder will be applied against Penn West's bank facility and will be available to spend on acquisition, exploration and development in 1997. -- Reuters Calgary Bureau 403 531-1624
